## Overview: Day Two

:::{style="text-align:justify"}
Day 2 of the R4HTA India 2025 workshop focused on advanced Health Technology Assessment modeling and analysis in R. Participants learned how to build **decision trees**, implement **Markov models**, explore **homogeneous Markov models using heemod**, and understand **probability distributions** relevant for HTA applications.
